situation.title: Mental hygiene of frontline workers
situation.meta_description: Recommendations for maintaining mental health for frontline workers

content.processed:
Recommendations

The basic recommendations (in Czech) for maintaining mental health during a pandemic were issued by the Association of Clinical Psychologists of the Czech Republic. 

Special crisis lines have also been set up for paramedics and other front-line workers:

  • COLLEGIAL SUPPORT LINE for healthcare workers: 607 400 591, 720 219 618
  • SOCIAL CLINICS: PSYCHOLOGICAL ASSISTANCE FOR ASSISTING PROFESSIONS (doctors, health professionals, social workers, teachers, hygienists, firefighters, and police officers, etc.): 733 644 268 or online: https://www.socialniklinika.cz
  • Support and supervision #dělámcomůžu: 116 123
